text.section: The board of directors of the Kentucky Natural History Museum shall establish the Kentucky Natural History Museum. The board shall implement KRS 146.650 to 146.666 to the extent practical prior to operation of the museum. Working to achieve the public purposes that are the goals of implementation of KRS 146.650 to 146.666 shall not be dependent on the existence and operation of the museum in a physical place.
The board shall be administratively linked to the Tourism, Arts and Heritage Cabinet.
To accomplish the purposes of KRS 146.650 to 146.666, the board may provide and administer grants to public and private entities.

law.history: Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 16, sec. 15, effective June 25, 2009. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 211, sec. 18, effective July 12, 2006. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 329, sec. 3, effective July 14, 2000.
